item.title: Barnes Group Inc. Announces First Quarter 2016 Earnings Conference Call and Webcast
item.description: [Business Wire] - Barnes Group Inc. today announced it will release first quarter 2016 financial results on Friday, April 29, 2016, before the market opens.

BARNES GROUP INC Financials
Barnes Group Inc. Names Michael A. Beck Senior Vice President, Barnes Group Inc. and President, Barnes Aerospace
item.description: [Business Wire] - Barnes Group Inc. , an international industrial and aerospace manufacturer and service provider, today announced the appointment of Michael Beck to the position of Senior Vice President, Barnes Group Inc.

item.title: Barnes Aerospace Announces New Long-Term Supply Agreement With UTC Aerospace
Barnes Aerospace and UTC Aerospace Systems Announce Long-Term Supply Agreement
item.description: [Business Wire] - Barnes Group Inc. , an international industrial and aerospace manufacturer and service provider, today announced that it has entered into a long-term aerospace supply agreement with UTC Aerospace Systems, a unit of United Technologies Corp.

Barnes Group Inc. Reports Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2015 Financial Results
item.description: [Business Wire] - Barnes Group Inc. , an international industrial and aerospace manufacturer and service provider, today reported financial results for the fourth quarter and full year 2015.

item.title: BARNES GROUP INC Files SEC form 8-K, Amendments to Articles of Inc. or Bylaws; Change in Fiscal Year
Barnes Group Inc. Declares Quarterly Dividend
item.description: [Business Wire] - The Board of Directors of Barnes Group Inc. has declared a quarterly cash dividend of twelve cents per share. The dividend will be payable March 10, 2016 to shareholders of record at the close of business on February 25, 2016.
